links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..900
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (23,-152,220)
formula: a(n) = 11^(n+2)/9+2^(n-1)/9-25*10^n/2. a(n) = A016135(n+1)-A016134(n+1). [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, Jun 05 2009, corrected by R. J. Mathar, Mar 14 2011a(n) = 21*a(n-1) - 110*a(n-2) + 2^n. -  Vincenzo Librandi, Oct 09 2011
prog: (Sage) [(11^n - 2^n)/9-(10^n - 2^n)/8 for n in xrange(2,19)] # [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, Jun 05 2009](MAGMA) [(2*11^(n+2) +2^n-225*10^n)/18 : n in [0..20]]; // Vincenzo Librandi, Oct 09 2011(PARI) Vec(1/((1-2*x)*(1-10*x)*(1-11*x))+O(x^99)) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Sep 23 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
